mapper.select: SELECT m.*, p.* FROM wadiz_member m LEFT JOIN wadiz_member_profile p ON m.ID = p.ID WHERE m.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update wadiz_member set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, nickname=#{nickname}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
update wadiz_member_profile set profile_name=#{profile_name}, profile_size=#{profile_size}, profile_url=#{profile_url} where id=#{id}
update wadiz_member set pwd=#{pwd} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from wadiz_buy_info where id=#{id}

select wbi.bino,wbi.acno,wbi.wfno,wbi.wsno,wbi.rno,wbi.rname,wfd.fcname,wfd.makername,wfd.endday, wbi.tprice,wbi.gcount,to_char(wbi.regdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as myday, wbi.rprice,wbi.rcont,wbi.delfee,wbi.delstart,wbi.usepoint from wadiz_buy_info wbi JOIN wadiz_fund_detail wfd ON wbi.wfno=wfd.wfno where wbi.id=#{id}
select wm.nickname, wmp.profile_url, wm.id, wsf.followid from wadiz_member wm join wadiz_member_profile wmp on wm.id = wmp.id join wadiz_sup_follow wsf on wm.id = wsf.followid where wsf.id = #{id}
